metadata.title: CVE-2023-0193 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK contains a vulnerability in cuobjdump, where alocal user running the tool against a malicious binary may cause anout-of-bounds read, which may result in a limited denial of service andlimited information disclosure.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
